trans-unit.source: Implements a markup extension that supports the binding between the value of a property in a template and the value of some other exposed property on the templated control.
You use `TemplateBinding` in template to bind to a value on the control the template is applied to.
A `TemplateBinding` is more efficient than a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> but it has less functionality.

Using a `TemplateBinding` is equivalent to using a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> with the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.TemplatedParent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateBindingExtension"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateBindingExtension"></xref> class with the specified dependency property that is the source of the binding.
The identifier of the property being bound.
Gets or sets the converter that interprets between source and target of a binding.
This value is not the <xref:System.Windows.TemplateBindingExtensionConverter>.
It is a specific converter pattern supported by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding.
## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The converter implementation.
This value defaults to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> and is typically provided as an optional parameter of the binding.
Gets or sets the parameter to pass to the converter.
## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The parameter being bound as referenced by the converter implementation.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the property being bound to.
## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifier of the dependency property being bound.
Returns an object that should be set as the value on the target object's property for this markup extension.
For <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateBindingExtension"></xref>, this is an expression (<xref href="System.Windows.TemplateBindingExpression"></xref>) that supports the binding.
An object that can provide services for the markup extension.
May be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> in this implementation.
The expression that supports the binding.
